line.text: Lo as a careful huswife runs to catch
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: One of her feathered creatures broke away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sets down her babe and makes all swift dispatch
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In pursuit of the thing she would have stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst her neglected child holds her in chase
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Cries to catch her whose busy care is bent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To follow that which flies before her face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Not prizing her poor infant discontent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So run thou after that which flies from thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst I thy babe chase thee afar behind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But if thou catch thy hope turn back to me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And play the mother part kiss me be kind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So will I pray that thou mayst have thy Will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thou turn back and my loud crying still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
